page.title: 06Royston Diamond Majorettes
page.content: Royston Diamond Majorettes were formed in September 1982.We have a troupe consisting of 50 girls ages ranging from 6 to 16 years. The colours are red and white with gold trim.There are 6 maces and 15 batons .There are 20 members of the Band. The instruments are cornets,tenor drums,side drums, Glockenspiels and 1 base drum.The mace is a wooden stick with metal on the end.The baton is a piece of metal with two weighted ends.The colour guard has a long metal pole with a piece of silk material attached.All the band play their own instruments. We train two nights a week in the comprehensive School.We have gained 151 trophies in 3 years.We have our own bus. It is a single decker.So far this year we have been to 10 competitions and 5 galas and have achieved 7 firsts and 2 seconds.
